original_text:
Jolly Roger 2
La Play’N’Go ritorna con Jolly Rogers 2, il secondo capitolo delle slot dedicata alla pirateria, tra pirati senza scrupoli e galeoni ricchi di oro e pietre preziose!
Tema e grafica
Con il termine Jolly Roger si intende il famoso vessillo con teschio e tibie incrociate che contraddistingueva le navi pirata. Questo simbolo divenuto universale racconta la storia affascinante di uomini, spesso ex corsari, che si ribellano al sistema e cominciano a solcare i mari Caraibici per saccheggiare galeoni e navi commerciali.
Entrando nel dettaglio della slot, cominciamo subito col dire che la grafica è spettacolare, come da tradizione delle slot targate Play’N’Go Go. La griglia di gioco si staglia sulla prua di una nave pirata, da cui possiamo ammirare il mare caraibico sormontato da altre navi pirata. Sopra la cornice si trova la scritta Jolly Roger, con le parole divise da una bussola, elemento non casuale ma che ha un ruolo importante durante lo svolgimento del gioco. La musica epica e incalzante rotta dal suono delle onde e dal canto dei gabbiani è quella tipica che accompagnano famosi film ispirati alle gesta dei pirati.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia ha un taglio classico, con 5 rulli e 3 righe. In Jolly Roger 2 abbiamo 20 linee di pagamento fisse su cui è possibile puntare da 0,20 € fino a 100 €. La vincita massima potenziale è di ben 5.000 volte la puntata! Con volatilità media, questa slot ha un RTP pari al 96%. È possibile impostare tra i 10 e i 100 giri automatici, compresi alcuni limiti al raggiungimento dei quali il gioco si interrompe.
Simboli e funzionalità
Iniziamo a dire che durante il gioco può attivarsi in modo casuale la funzione Compass: la bussola in alto elargisce un moltiplicatore compreso tra 2x a 10x. Per quel che riguarda i premi del gioco regolare, i simboli che pagano meno sono quelli legati alle carte da gioco, dal 10 all’Asso. A seguire troviamo l’anello con il teschio, la croce dorata, i diamanti e lo scrigno del tesoro. Il simbolo Wild è il jolly Rogers, il teschi con le tibie incrociate, e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, qui rappresentato dal pirata. 3 di questi simboli attivano la funzione Bonus Quest Feature: sullo schermo vedremo apparire dei rotoli di pergamene che una volta srotolate ci daranno la possibilità di affrontare uno dei tre giochi bonus. Vediamo nel dettaglio le caratteristiche di ogni livello speciale:

Instant Prize: dallo scrigno che appare al centro della schermata verrà conferito un premio casuale tra x2 e x10 o ripagare x15 o x20 la puntata totale. Durante questa funzione può attivarsi anche la funzione Compass.
Bottle of Rum Free Spins: si comincia con un giro gratuito, dopodiché vedremo apparire alla base dei rulli delle bottiglie di rum. Cliccando su 2, gli interi rulli corrispondente verranno ricoperti di Wild. Anche in questo caso potrebbe attivarsi la funzione Compass.
Battle Free Spins: in questo caso sarà necessario sconfiggere i galeoni, portoghesi, inglesi e olandesi per ottenere un premio e un Compass Multiplier
Treasure Hunt: con questo Bonus, si ha diritto a 10 Free Spins. Lo scopo è raccogliere almeno 4 mappe per scoprire il tesoro sepolto. Inoltre, un simbolo a caso diventerà Wild e si avrà diritto a un Compass Multiplier. Una volta trovato il tesoro, si verrà ricompensati con ulteriori Free Spin.

raw_translation.response:
Jolly Roger 2

Play'n'Go returns with Jolly Roger 2, the second chapter of the pirate-themed slot machines, featuring ruthless pirates and galleons full of gold and precious stones!

Theme and graphics

The term Jolly Roger refers to the famous flag with a skull and crossbones that distinguished pirate ships. This universal symbol tells the fascinating story of men, often former corsairs, who rebel against the system and begin to sail the Caribbean seas to loot galleons and merchant ships.

Getting into the details of the slot, let's start by saying that the graphics are spectacular, as is tradition for Play'n'Go slot machines. The game grid stands out on the bow of a pirate ship, from which we can admire the Caribbean sea topped by other pirate ships. Above the frame is the word Jolly Roger, with the words divided by a compass, which is not a coincidence but has an important role during the game. The epic and exciting music broken by the sound of waves and the singing of seagulls is the typical one that accompanies famous films inspired by the exploits of pirates.

Slot features

The grid has a classic cut, with 5 reels and 3 rows. In Jolly Roger 2, we have 20 fixed pay lines on which you can bet from €0.20 up to €100. The maximum potential win is a whopping 5,000 times the bet! With medium volatility, this slot has an RTP of 96%. It is possible to set between 10 and 100 automatic spins, including some limits that the game interrupts.

Symbols and functionalities

Let's start by saying that during the game, the Compass feature can be randomly activated: the compass above gives a multiplier ranging from 2x to 10x. As for the regular game prizes, the symbols that pay the least are those linked to the playing cards, from 10 to Ace. Next, we have the skull ring, the golden cross, diamonds, and the treasure chest. The Wild symbol is Jolly Rogers, the skull with crossed bones, and it replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented here by the pirate. Three of these symbols activate the Bonus Quest Feature function: on the screen, we will see scrolls appear that, once unrolled, will give us the opportunity to face one of the three bonus games. Let's see in detail the characteristics of each special level:

Instant Prize: from the chest that appears in the center of the screen, a random prize between x2 and x10 or a repayment of x15 or x20 the total bet will be awarded. During this function, the Compass function can also be activated.
Bottle of Rum Free Spins: it starts with a free spin, then we will see rum bottles appear at the base of the reels. By clicking on 2 of them, the corresponding entire reels will be covered in Wild. Even in this case, the Compass function could be activated.
Battle Free Spins: in this case, it will be necessary to defeat the Portuguese, English, and Dutch galleons to obtain a reward and a Compass Multiplier
Treasure Hunt: with this Bonus, you are entitled to 10 Free Spins. The aim is to collect at least 4 maps to discover the buried treasure. In addition, a random symbol will become Wild, and you will be entitled to a Compass Multiplier. Once the treasure is found, you will be rewarded with additional Free Spins.

As experienced gamblers, you will appreciate the wide range of features and the potential for big wins in Jolly Roger 2. The theme and graphics are well-executed, and the addition of the Compass multiplier adds to the excitement of the game. Don't miss the chance to join the pirate crew and take home the treasure!

As for the slot's graphics, they are nothing short of spectacular, as is typical of Play'n'Go slots. The Jolly Roger title atop the frame is divided by a compass, an essential element that plays a vital role in the game. The epic and mounting music, breaking waves and seagulls' calls will transport you to an adventure movie-inspired world.

Slot Features:
The slot grid is a classic 5-reel, 3-row with 20 fixed pay lines that accept bets ranging from €0.20 to €100. The maximum potential win is up to 5000 times your bet! With medium volatility, this slot's RTP is 96%. You can set auto-spin from 10 to 100, including preset limits that pause the game upon reaching them.

Symbols and Special Features:
The Compass feature can randomly activate during gameplay, where the compass above the grid awards a 2x to 10x multiplier. As for the regular game prizes, the lowest paying symbols are the ten through ace cards. The higher paying ones follow, from the skull ring, golden cross, and diamonds, then the treasure chest. The Wild symbol is the Jolly Roger himself, the skull and crossed bones, which replaces all symbols except for the Scatter - a pirate symbol. Three Scatter symbols trigger the Bonus Quest feature, where parchment scrolls appear on the screen, and you get to choose one of the three special feature games:

Instant Prize: From the treasure chest shown in the center of the screen, you can win a random prize worth 2x to 10x or even a total bet return of 15x or 20x. The Compass feature can also activate during this game.
Bottle of Rum Free Spins: You start with one free spin, and then rum bottles appear below the reels. When you click on two bottles, the corresponding reels transform into Wilds. And again, the Compass feature can activate during the game.
Battle Free Spins: In this game, you must defeat the Portuguese, English, and Dutch galleons to win a prize and a Compass Multiplier.
Treasure Hunt: This Bonus entitles you to ten free spins. You have to collect at least four maps to discover the buried treasure. A random symbol turns into a Wild, and you get a Compass Multiplier. Once you find the treasure, you are rewarded with additional free spins.

In conclusion, Jolly Roger 2 is an exciting and beautifully designed experience that promises to keep you entertained and give you plenty of chances to win big. So, will you join the crew and set sail to plunder the riches of the high seas?

Review: Jolly Roger 2

Play'n'Go returns with Jolly Roger 2, the second chapter of the pirate-themed slot machines, featuring ruthless pirates and galleons full of gold and precious stones!

Theme and graphics

The term Jolly Roger refers to the famous flag with a skull and crossbones that distinguished pirate ships. This universal symbol tells the fascinating story of men, often former corsairs, who rebel against the system and begin to sail the Caribbean seas to loot galleons and merchant ships.

Getting into the details of the slot, let's start by saying that the graphics are spectacular, as is tradition for Play'n'Go slot machines. The game grid stands out on the bow of a pirate ship, from which we can admire the Caribbean sea topped by other pirate ships. Above the frame is the word Jolly Roger, with the words divided by a compass, which is not a coincidence but has an important role during the game. The epic and exciting music broken by the sound of waves and the singing of seagulls is the typical one that accompanies famous films inspired by the exploits of pirates.

Slot features

The grid has a classic cut, with 5 reels and 3 rows. In Jolly Roger 2, we have 20 fixed pay lines on which you can bet from €0.20 up to €100. The maximum potential win is a whopping 5,000 times the bet! With medium volatility, this slot has an RTP of 96%. It is possible to set between 10 and 100 automatic spins, including some limits that the game interrupts.

Symbols and functionalities

Let's start by saying that during the game, the Compass feature can be randomly activated: the compass above gives a multiplier ranging from 2x to 10x. As for the regular game prizes, the symbols that pay the least are those linked to the playing cards, from 10 to Ace. Next, we have the skull ring, the golden cross, diamonds, and the treasure chest. The Wild symbol is Jolly Rogers, the skull with crossed bones, and it replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented here by the pirate. Three of these symbols activate the Bonus Quest Feature function: on the screen, we will see scrolls appear that, once unrolled, will give us the opportunity to face one of the three bonus games. Let's see in detail the characteristics of each special level:

Instant Prize: from the chest that appears in the center of the screen, a random prize between x2 and x10 or a repayment of x15 or x20 the total bet will be awarded. During this function, the Compass function can also be activated.
Bottle of Rum Free Spins: it starts with a free spin, then we will see rum bottles appear at the base of the reels. By clicking on 2 of them, the corresponding entire reels will be covered in Wild. Even in this case, the Compass function could be activated.
Battle Free Spins: in this case, it will be necessary to defeat the Portuguese, English, and Dutch galleons to obtain a reward and a Compass Multiplier
Treasure Hunt: with this Bonus, you are entitled to 10 Free Spins. The aim is to collect at least 4 maps to discover the buried treasure. In addition, a random symbol will become Wild, and you will be entitled to a Compass Multiplier. Once the treasure is found, you will be rewarded with additional Free Spins.

As experienced gamblers, you will appreciate the wide range of features and the potential for big wins in Jolly Roger 2. The theme and graphics are well-executed, and the addition of the Compass multiplier adds to the excitement of the game. Don't miss the chance to join the pirate crew and take home the treasure!

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Jolly Roger 2 is a pirate-themed slot game developed by Play'n'Go. This slot features 5 reels and 3 rows, along with 20 fixed pay lines. The Compass feature can randomly activate during gameplay, and the compass symbol on the game frame gives a multiplier ranging from 2x to 10x. The standard symbols in the game include playing cards from 10 to Ace, a skull ring, a golden cross, diamonds, and a treasure chest. The Wild symbol is Jolly Rogers, and it substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter symbol. Three Scatter symbols activate the Bonus Quest Feature function, during which players can choose from 4 special levels with increasing rewards: Instant Prize, Bottle of Rum Free Spins, Battle Free Spins, and Treasure Hunt. The maximum potential win in this slot is 5,000 times the bet, with medium volatility and an RTP of 96%.

Graphics and Sound Design

Jolly Roger 2 has excellent graphics, typical of Play'n'Go slot games. The game frame is on the bow of a pirate ship, and the background shows the Caribbean sea with other pirate ships. The word Jolly Roger appears above the frame with a compass that plays an essential role during the game. The game's sound design features exciting and epic music, including the sound of waves and seagulls, reminiscent of famous pirate-themed films.

Paylines, and Betting Options

Jolly Roger 2 features 20 fixed pay lines on which players can bet from €0.20 up to €100 per spin. Players can also set between 10 and 100 automatic spins with some limits that the game interrupts if reached. The Compass feature can randomly activate during gameplay, giving a multiplier ranging from 2x to 10x.

Bonus Quest Feature

Jolly Roger 2's Bonus Quest Feature gets activated when players land 3 Scatter symbols. Once activated, players will be offered four special levels - Instant Prize, Bottle of Rum Free Spins, Battle Free Spins, and Treasure Hunt - with increasing rewards. The Instant Prize offers an immediate reward ranging from x2 to x10 of the total bet or a repayment of x15 or x20 of the total bet. The Bottle of Rum Free Spins level starts with a free spin and gives players the opportunity to cover entire reels with Wild symbols by clicking on rum bottles that appear at the base of the reels. The Battle Free Spins level requires players to defeat the Portuguese, English, and Dutch galleons to obtain a reward and a Compass Multiplier. Finally, the Treasure Hunt level offers ten Free Spins and a chance to collect Wild symbols and Compass Multipliers by uncovering maps to find the treasure.

Winning Potential and RTP

In Jolly Roger 2, the maximum potential win is an impressive 5,000 times the bet, with medium volatility and an RTP of 96%. With a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum bet of €100, players can win big in this pirate-themed slot game. Moreover, the Bonus Quest Feature and the Compass multiplier add to the excitement of the game and increase the potential for big payouts.

Review: Jolly Roger 2

Play'n'Go returns with Jolly Roger 2, the second chapter of the pirate-themed slot machines, featuring ruthless pirates and galleons full of gold and precious stones!

Theme and graphics

The term Jolly Roger refers to the famous flag with a skull and crossbones that distinguished pirate ships. This universal symbol tells the fascinating story of men, often former corsairs, who rebel against the system and begin to sail the Caribbean seas to loot galleons and merchant ships.

Getting into the details of the slot, let's start by saying that the graphics are spectacular, as is tradition for Play'n'Go slot machines. The game grid stands out on the bow of a pirate ship, from which we can admire the Caribbean sea topped by other pirate ships. Above the frame is the word Jolly Roger, with the words divided by a compass, which is not a coincidence but has an important role during the game. The epic and exciting music broken by the sound of waves and the singing of seagulls is the typical one that accompanies famous films inspired by the exploits of pirates.

Slot features

The grid has a classic cut, with 5 reels and 3 rows. In Jolly Roger 2, we have 20 fixed pay lines on which you can bet from €0.20 up to €100. The maximum potential win is a whopping 5,000 times the bet! With medium volatility, this slot has an RTP of 96%. It is possible to set between 10 and 100 automatic spins, including some limits that the game interrupts.

Symbols and functionalities

Let's start by saying that during the game, the Compass feature can be randomly activated: the compass above gives a multiplier ranging from 2x to 10x. As for the regular game prizes, the symbols that pay the least are those linked to the playing cards, from 10 to Ace. Next, we have the skull ring, the golden cross, diamonds, and the treasure chest. The Wild symbol is Jolly Rogers, the skull with crossed bones, and it replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented here by the pirate. Three of these symbols activate the Bonus Quest Feature function: on the screen, we will see scrolls appear that, once unrolled, will give us the opportunity to face one of the three bonus games. Let's see in detail the characteristics of each special level:

Instant Prize: from the chest that appears in the center of the screen, a random prize between x2 and x10 or a repayment of x15 or x20 the total bet will be awarded. During this function, the Compass function can also be activated.
Bottle of Rum Free Spins: it starts with a free spin, then we will see rum bottles appear at the base of the reels. By clicking on 2 of them, the corresponding entire reels will be covered in Wild. Even in this case, the Compass function could be activated.
Battle Free Spins: in this case, it will be necessary to defeat the Portuguese, English, and Dutch galleons to obtain a reward and a Compass Multiplier
Treasure Hunt: with this Bonus, you are entitled to 10 Free Spins. The aim is to collect at least 4 maps to discover the buried treasure. In addition, a random symbol will become Wild, and you will be entitled to a Compass Multiplier. Once the treasure is found, you will be rewarded with additional Free Spins.

As experienced gamblers, you will appreciate the wide range of features and the potential for big wins in Jolly Roger 2. The theme and graphics are well-executed, and the addition of the Compass multiplier adds to the excitement of the game. Don't miss the chance to join the pirate crew and take home the treasure!
